document_data.mainbody:
onah was a news hawker who worked for the Baldurs Mouth Gazette in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Jonah was a dusky-skinned human child with icy-blue eyes and hazel hair.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Jonah could often be found peddling the Baldurs Mouth Gazette in the Lower City near the Manor Gate. Jonah could not stand the broadsheet he peddled. Jonah worked for the Mouth only because his father forced him to.
